thread.title: STEVE BROYLES
thread.title_full: Nebraska Furniture Mart reviewed by STEVE BROYLES

author: STEVE BROYLES
title: STEVE BROYLES
text:
Waited for sale price and free driveway delivery to happen at the same time. Best price yet !
What happened to free in home delivery for furniture? Will have to settle for driveway to get my desired recliner and 8√ó10 rug. Overall other than the month wait for rug order to arrive to be delivered with recliner, why ? Yet in the end with the financing options to save additional cost,
Should provide long term "SMILES"!!üòÜüòâüòè
